books.title: Clean Code
books.description: Even bad code can function. But if code isn't clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees. Every year, countless hours and significant resources are lost because of poorly written code

reviews.review: An excellent book for any developer!

books.title: Distributed systems: Principles and Paradigms
books.description: Virtually every computing system today is part of a distributed system. Programmers, developers, and engineers need to understand the underlying principles and paradigms as well as the real-world application of those principles.
